name: riverine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or found on a river or rivers, or the banks of a river: Alaska's coastal and riverine villages are plagued by erosion.
More examplesFewer examplesThese clinics now serve some 400 riverine villages, and 1,600 on the mainland.the director of UM's Center for Riverine Science and Stream RenaturalizationThe focus may switch to emergency relief from natural disasters, such as floods, cyclones and tsunamis in coastal and riverine regions of Asia.The erosion will have a detrimental effect on water quality and riverine life.
